page.title: 14PLAYGROUND GAMES 2
page.content: { Touch Down}is a chasing game.About six people are on and two or three are being chased.You have to play on grass or you will hurt yourself.The idea is to catch people and trip them or push them over.Nobody wins and nobody loses and it is quite rough.It is mostly girls chasing boys or boys chasing girls. { Farmer,Farmer}has one person who is on, he is the farmer.The other people are pupils.They have to say,"{Farmer, {Farmer}please may we cross your golden bridge?". The Farmer will say,"Only if you are wearing green." or some other colour that he chooses. If you are wearing that colour then you can cross safely without being chased, otherwise you have to struggle across and avoid the Farmer. If you are caught you become the Farmer.{ }
